Intellectual Property Protection & Competitive Behavior
Code Metric Disclosure Referencer

legal proceedings associated with anticompetitive 
behavior regulationsDisclosure of legal proceedings for 
material issues can be found in our 
2020 Form 10-K
Managing Systemic Risks from Technology Disruptions
Code Metric Disclosure Referencer
TC-SI-550a.1Number of (1) Performance issues 
Not Reported (2) Service disruptions;
(3)Total customer downtime
TC-SI-550a.2Description of business continuity risks related to disruptions  
of operationsReported notably on pages 15, 17 and 
22 of our 2020 Form 10-K under  
“Global Operational Risks”
